fields.name: Rent:
fields.value: $20X where X is the number of Capsule Properties held by the Owner.

fields.name: Stop-in Effects:
fields.value:
Depends on the number of Capsule Properties held by the owner.
1. Roll a d6. Pay 3x the number shown to the owner.
2. Roll 2d6. Pay 5x the number shown to the owner.
3. Roll 4d6. Pay 10x the number shown to the owner.
